content.subTittlePresentation: Hi, I´m Yunes Noronha Fullstack Developer from Brazil with {{year}} years of experience.

about.subTittleAbout: I'm a Fullstack developer passionate about technology. I like to develop simple, clean and elegant websites that provide real value to the end user. Simple is always the best. I have 11+ years of experience with software development in various technologies on the market, great experience with web development with React/Node js and database design. Great knowledge in other languages like C#, Python, Js, Typescript etc. All this time I have seen major programming paradigm shifts as well as project management methodologies.

description: Developed and maintaining an onboarding app available for 20k new customers daily.

Digital onboarding - Exclusive welcome site for the arrival of new customers, where it is possible to have a first contact with the chosen plan and validation of registration data. Built on React js and Node js with Graphql.
